Elliotte Harold wrote:
> One more time everyone:
> 
> THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE CREDIT CARD NUMBER BEING SNIFFED IN TRANSIT.
> 
> THIS IS ABOUT THE CARD NUMBER (or other confidential data) BEING VIEWED
> IN THE BROWSER'S LOCATION BAR LOCALLY.

The thing is, credit card numbers are not secrets. I mean, they're
printed on the front of the credit card in big readable digits.
-- 
Chris Burdess
